page.title: 10Government in Caerhun Parish
page.content:
M.P.: Mr. Wyn Roberts, 'Tan Gwalia', Rowen. Conservative, he has represented the area since 1974. Labour, Liberal and Welsh Nationalist views are also supported.
Gwynedd County: Councillor Mr. O.M. Roberts. Services provided - Recreation; Snowdonia National Park; Public protection; Police; Social services; Education.
Aberconwy Borough: Councillor Mrs. B. Jones, Llechwedd. Services provided - Environmental health; Land drainage; Refuse collection; Maintenance of 'B' roads; Help for elderly and disabled.
Caerhun Community Council (Rowen area): Councillor Mrs. Eluned Roberts. Committees held in Welsh, minutes written in Welsh.
